Tanks

Class HUD

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tanks.HUD

  • public class HUD
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the display of various heads-up display (HUD) elements in the Tanks game, such as health bars, fuel icons, parachutes, and game-ending messages.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HUD(processing.core.PApplet app)
      Constructor for HUD class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void displayChuteIcon(Tank tank)
      Displays the parachute icon and remaining count for the specified tank.
      void displayFuel(Tank tank)
      Displays the fuel status next to the fuel icon.
      void displayHealth(Tank tank)
      Displays the health bar of the tank.
      void displayLeaderboard(App app)
      Displays the leaderboard with scores of all players.
      void displayTheEnd()
      Displays the end game message and a list of player scores in descending order.
      void drawArrow(Tank tank)
      Draws an arrow pointing to the tank's position.
      void whoIsDaPlayer(Tank currentTank)
      Displays the current player's turn information.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • drawArrow

        public void drawArrow(Tank tank)
        Draws an arrow pointing to the tank's position.

        tank - The tank for which to draw the arrow.

      • whoIsDaPlayer

        public void whoIsDaPlayer(Tank currentTank)
        Displays the current player's turn information.
        Parameters:
        currentTank - The tank that is currently active.

      • displayFuel

        public void displayFuel(Tank tank)
        Displays the fuel status next to the fuel icon.
        Parameters:
        tank - The tank whose fuel status is to be displayed.

      • displayChuteIcon

        public void displayChuteIcon(Tank tank)
        Displays the parachute icon and remaining count for the specified tank.
        Parameters:
        tank - The tank whose parachute info is displayed.

      • displayHealth

        public void displayHealth(Tank tank)
        Displays the health bar of the tank.
        Parameters:

      • displayLeaderboard

        public void displayLeaderboard(App app)
        Displays the leaderboard with scores of all players.
        Parameters:
        app - The main application instance to access scores.

      • displayTheEnd

        public void displayTheEnd()
        Displays the end game message and a list of player scores in descending order.
